WorkItem.Description:
The problem that recently developed after the last patch where survivability but no DPS was showing in the optimizer has reversed now in 4.2.1.  Now only DPS shows in the optimizer and no survivability.  I believe this is different from Issue #21140, so I have posted it separately.
Â 
File has been added.  Please see email directly to Kavan.
WorkItem.Summary: RAWR Mage now only showing DPS but not survivability.

Comments.Message: Without a character xml I can't tell you anything. Are you sure you're not imagining things? Remember survivability in default settings is very small (on the order of 10 compared to 30000 for dps) so it's very very tiny to see.
